backend/main.mo: Defines an actor exposing a query method returning an empty Nat array.
feature_evidence.json: Holds feature evidence metadata linking features to source files, components, tests, and confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Sets global Tailwind styles, OKLCH color variables, and brand-themed light/dark mode values.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry with Gujarati language, meta tags, and script mounting the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Creates the TanStack Router setup and registers routes for Home, About, Services, and Contact pages.
frontend/src/components/BrandHeader.tsx: Renders the Gujarati brand name in configurable sizes using brand typography and colors.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Wraps all pages with navigation, main content outlet, and a footer with attribution.
frontend/src/components/ReplaceableImage: Displays an image with a small Gujarati overlay label indicating it is replaceable.
frontend/src/components/ServiceCard.tsx: Shows a service icon and title inside a styled card using ReplaceableImage.
frontend/src/components/SiteNav.tsx: Builds the sticky navigation header with brand title and active-route Gujarati nav links.
frontend/src/content/gu.ts: Centralized Gujarati text content for navigation, pages, business details, and UI labels.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current identity and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity login, identity persistence, and status management through React context.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, Gujarati font, color variables, and light/dark theme styles with custom utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider, loading App and global CSS.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with a replaceable illustration and Gujarati text sections from content.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Displays contact info with phone and hours, using icons, replaceable image, and a call button.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page with hero header, sewing illustration, description, working hours, and a call-now button.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Lists tailoring services using predefined titles and icons rendered via ServiceCard components.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom fonts, colors from CSS variables, plugins, and extended theme options.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, requirements, constraints, and existing feature tracking for the website.
